QuestData.Title: The Runes that Bind
QuestData.Description:
The stone tablet here describes a ritual where a powerful spirit can be broken into weaker pieces by binding them to special runestones. It looks like the Bonespeakers may be using this very ritual to weaken the spirit of Ashildir.
It may be impossible to summon her with her spirit so weakened. The rituals must be stopped.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Ritual Stones to stop the rituals binding Ashildir's spirit in Haustvald.
QuestData.RewardText: These mystics have gone to great lengths to weaken Ashildir. $B$BWe must hope that her spirit is strong enough for the wakening.
